item.title: Continually refining this website
item.description:
While I should be studying for my semesters, I was building this instead

Skills

Gained

Learning

Surprises

This journey came with more than a few unexpected surprises. But what’s surprises if not learning lessons? Here’s some of things I encountered and learnt along the way:

Learning never stops

The deeper you delve into a topic, the more you realize what you don’t know

I thought this would be a quick and easy project. Setting things up seemed like the hardest part, but after that, I ran into new problems.
